Hi,

As the subject says, 
I have code works with textui, but not with swingui/awtui.

With 3.7, I get 
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Native Method)
	at junit.runner.BaseTestRunner.getTest(BaseTestRunner.java:53)
	at junit.awtui.TestRunner.runSuite(TestRunner.java:393)
	at junit.awtui.TestRunner.start(TestRunner.java:474)
	at junit.awtui.TestRunner.main(TestRunner.java:315)
	at junit.awtui.TestRunner.run(TestRunner.java:320)


the swingui/awtui are not vital to me, but I'd like to experience the
green bar effect.

Any idea.

Alain Ravet
Brussels, Belgium
